Description.Details: The Black Knight 6b was the harder-hitting, cooler-running Star League ancestor to the standard BL-7-KNT we have today. It did everything the 7 does, but better—mostly thanks to its Double Heat Sinks, which are basically nonexistent these days.

YangsThoughts: The Black Knight 6b was the harder-hitting, cooler-running Star League ancestor to the standard BL-7-KNT we have today. It did everything the 7 does, but better—mostly thanks to its Double Heat Sinks, which are basically nonexistent these days.
